Class Ball

java.lang.Object
Ball
public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
Models a simple solid sphere. This class represents a Ball object. When combined with the GameArena class, instances of the Ball class can be displayed on the screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(double x, double y, double diameter, java.lang.String col)
      Constructor. Creates a Ball with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate of centre of the Ball (in pixels)
      y - The y co-ordinate of centre of the Ball (in pixels)
      diameter - The diameter of the Ball (in pixels)
      col - The colour of the Ball (Permissable colours are: BLACK, BLUE, CYAN, DARKGREY, GREY, GREEN, LIGHTGREY, MAGENTA, ORANGE, PINK, RED, WHITE, YELLOW or ##RRGGBB)

    • Ball

      public Ball​(double x, double y, double diameter, java.lang.String col, int layer)
      Constructor. Creates a Ball with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate of centre of the Ball (in pixels)
      y - The y co-ordinate of centre of the Ball (in pixels)
      diameter - The diameter of the Ball (in pixels)
      col - The colour of the Ball (Permissable colours are: BLACK, BLUE, CYAN, DARKGREY, GREY, GREEN, LIGHTGREY, MAGENTA, ORANGE, PINK, RED, WHITE, YELLOW or ##RRGGBB)
      layer - The layer this ball is to be drawn on. Objects with a higher layer number are always drawn on top of those with lower layer numbers.

  • Method Details

    • getXPosition

      public double getXPosition()
      Obtains the current position of this Ball.
      Returns:
      the X coordinate of this Ball within the GameArena.

    • getYPosition

      public double getYPosition()
      Obtains the current position of this Ball.
      Returns:
      the Y coordinate of this Ball within the GameArena.

    • setXPosition

      public void setXPosition​(double x)
      Moves the current position of this Ball to the given co-ordinates
      Parameters:
      x - the new x co-ordinate of this Ball

    • setYPosition

      public void setYPosition​(double y)
      Moves the current position of this Ball to the given co-ordinates
      Parameters:
      y - the new y co-ordinate of this Ball

    • getSize

      public double getSize()
      Obtains the size of this Ball.
      Returns:
      the diameter of this Ball,in pixels.

    • setSize

      public void setSize​(double s)
      Sets the diameter of this Ball to the given size.
      Parameters:
      s - the new diameter of this Ball, in pixels.

    • getLayer

      public int getLayer()
      Obtains the layer of this Ball.
      Returns:
      the layer of this Ball.

    • setLayer

      public void setLayer​(int l)
      Sets the layer of this Ball.
      Parameters:
      l - the new layer of this Ball. Higher layer numbers are drawn on top of low layer numbers.

    • getColour

      public java.lang.String getColour()
      Obtains the colour of this Ball.
      Returns:
      a textual description of the colour of this Ball.

    • setColour

      public void setColour​(java.lang.String c)
      Sets the colour of this Ball.
      Parameters:
      c - the new colour of this Ball, as a String value. Permissable colours are: BLACK, BLUE, CYAN, DARKGREY, GREY, GREEN, LIGHTGREY, MAGENTA, ORANGE, PINK, RED, WHITE, YELLOW or #RRGGBB.
